title: Side Effects of the Quaking of America (with Resmaa Menakem) Part 2
description:
This week we continue our conversation with Resmaa Menakem, NY Times bestselling author of My Grandmother’s Hands, on the impact of generational trauma and other Black things. Resmaa's latest book, The Quaking of America is available now wherever books are sold.
IG @resmaamenakem
~
For more content, subscribe to our Patreon (patreon.com/smartfunnyandblack)!
~
